channel.title: Server being online
channel.description:
ok ive done port forwarding, folowed god of ikki's guide, followed tico i think it is guide. and still cant get my server online using the server ip, check the pics to see if im doing something wrong.
Thanks :)
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w155/jammy780/pic2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w155/jammy780/pic1.jpg[/img]

item.title: Server being online
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

You can get on with 0.0.0.0, other players use the .servegame.

Read full topic

item.title: Server being online
item.dc:creator: @imjammy780 imjammy780
item.description:
@imjammy780 wrote:

[quote=“Random666, post:6, topic:185431”]if it says error connecting to server then you havent anti-firewalled mopar’s port. To do that you:
Open Network Connections
Right Click and select properties
Go to advanced tab
And then click settings
Go to exeptions Tab
Select Add New Port
For Port Name Do anything and for the port type “43594”
Click Ok… and Ok again
Done![/quote]

Done that, and still nope

h311sd347h:

Just turn your firewall off, I never have my on, I have no anti-virus things, I never scan shit, my computer still is fine… I had a trojan, and I disected it, i quarrentined it <.<

just tried that and stil no. i can get it to work with hamanchi but i dont want to use that.

Read full topic

item.title: Server being online
item.dc:creator: @Random666 Random666
item.description:
@Random666 wrote:

if it says error connecting to server then you havent anti-firewalled mopar’s port. To do that you:
Open Network Connections
Right Click and select properties
Go to advanced tab
And then click settings
Go to exeptions Tab
Select Add New Port
For Port Name Do anything and for the port type “43594”
Click Ok… and Ok again
Done!

Read full topic

item.title: Server being online
item.dc:creator: @imjammy780 imjammy780
item.description:
@imjammy780 wrote:

Random666:

Are you saying you can’t log in to your server or are you saying it doesn’t show online in mopar status page?

yea im saying when i put in 1000.servegame.com, it says “Error connecting to server” and im sure ive done everything correct.

[quote=“h311sd347h, post:3, topic:185431”]Ummm, try for YOU to log in as, 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0, or no ip( no ip meaning blank space at ip.)

Then let someone else try to log in as your No-ip[/quote]

i’ll try that now.

[quote=“Random666, post:4, topic:185431”]oh yeah did you open run/runserver.bat?[/quote] yea ive done that

Read full topic
